languages.text: {n}На ваших глазах мутант меняется: опухоли, словно отлив, отступают, открывая вашему взгляду истощенное женское лицо, искаженное от боли. Женщина хватает ртом воздух, выгибает вновь ставшую подвижной шею и выдыхает:{/n} "ЛГУН! Ты обещал убить меня! Ты обещал избавление! Каждый из вас, каждый твердил мне — прими надежду, и боль уйдет! Прими Истину, ибо она есть надежда! Моя надежда — избавление от боли! Исполни мою надежду! ИСПОЛНИ МОЮ НАДЕЖ..." {n}Комок плоти за ее затылком вздрагивает и выпускает гладкие толстые щупальца, которые накрывают вопящее лицо и втягивают его в себя. На уши начинает давить: из клеток доносится мерный, едва уловимый звук, внушающий отчаяние и ужас.{/n}

{n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

Женщина хватает ртом воздух, выгибает вновь ставшую подвижной шею и выдыхает:{/n} "ЛГУН! Ты обещал убить меня! Ты обещал избавление! Каждый из вас, каждый твердил мне — прими надежду, и боль уйдет! ИСПОЛНИ МОЮ НАДЕЖ..." {n}Комок плоти за ее затылком вздрагивает и выпускает гладкие толстые щупальца, которые накрывают вопящее лицо и втягивают его в себя. languages.text: {n}这只变种怪物在你眼前发生了变化。它身上的肿瘤像退潮一样消散，露出了一张由于痛苦而变得扭曲、憔悴不堪的女性的脸。这个女性喘着粗气，伸展着终于可以活动的脖子，高喊起来。{/n}“骗子！你答应过会杀了我！你答应过会让我解脱！你们每个人都是骗子！每个人都告诉我要心怀希望，说只要这样，痛苦就会消失！接受真理吧，因为真理就是希望！我现在唯一的希望就是从这种痛苦中解脱出来！求求你，让我解脱吧！求求——”{n}她脑后的肉团颤抖着，伸出了光滑、肥厚的触手，蒙住了她不住哀嚎的脸，把她拖进了肉里。你感觉耳鼓传来了一阵压力，笼中传来了某个持久不衰，几乎令人无法察觉的声音，这个声音让你心里充满了恐惧与绝望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只变种怪物在你眼前发生了变化。它身上的肿瘤像退潮一样消散，露出了一张由于痛苦而变得扭曲、憔悴不堪的女性的脸。这个女性喘着粗气，伸展着终于可以活动的脖子，高喊起来。{/n}“骗子！你答应过会杀了我！你答应过会让我解脱！你们每个人都是骗子！每个人都告诉我要心怀希望，说只要这样，痛苦就会消失！接受真理吧，因为真理就是希望！我现在唯一的希望就是从这种痛苦中解脱出来！求求你，让我解脱吧！求求——”{n}她脑后的肉团颤抖着，伸出了光滑、肥厚的触手，蒙住了她不住哀嚎的脸，把她拖进了肉里。你感觉耳鼓传来了一阵压力。你从笼中听到了某个持久不衰，几乎令人无法察觉的声音。这个声音让你心里充满了恐惧与绝望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mutante se transforma ante tus ojos. Los tumores retroceden como la marea, revelando el rostro agónico y demacrado de una mujer. Respira jadeante, estira el cuello ahora que puede moverlo y exclama:{/n} «¡MENTIROSO! ¡Prometiste que me matarías! ¡Prometiste que me liberarías! ¡Todos, todos vosotros, me dijisteis que tuviera esperanza y el dolor desaparecería! ¡Acepta la Verdad, pues es la esperanza! ¡Mi única esperanza es quedar libre de este dolor! ¡Concédemelo! ¡CONCÉDEME...!». {n}El tumor de carne que tiene detrás de la cabeza se estremece y saca unos tentáculos lisos y gruesos que cubren su cara gimoteante y la arrastran al interior. Sientes una presión en los oídos. De la jaula sale un sonido constante y apenas perceptible que te llena de horror y desesperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante se transforma ante tus ojos. Los tumores retroceden como la marea, revelando el rostro agónico y demacrado de una mujer. Respira jadeante, estira el cuello ahora que puede moverlo y exclama:{/n} «¡MENTIROSO! ¡Prometiste que me matarías! ¡Prometiste que me liberarías! ¡Todos, cada uno de vosotros, me dijisteis que tuviera esperanza y el dolor desaparecería! ¡Acepta la Verdad, pues es la esperanza! ¡Mi única esperanza es quedar libre de este dolor! ¡Concédemelo! ¡CONCÉDEME...!». {n}El tumor de carne que tiene detrás de la cabeza se estremece y saca unos tentáculos lisos y gruesos que cubren su cara gimoteante y la arrastran al interior. Sientes una presión en los oídos. De la jaula sale un sonido constante y apenas perceptible que te llena de horror y desesperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}変異体があなたの眼前で変化していく。腫瘍が潮が引くように引き、苦痛に歪んだ痩せた女性の顔が現れる。女性は息をのみ、動くようになった首を伸ばして叫んだ。{/n}「嘘つき！あなたは私を殺すと約束した！あなたは私を救うと約束した！あなたたちの誰もが、誰もが、希望を持てば苦しみは去ると言った！真実を受け入れよ、それこそが希望なのだと！私の唯一の希望は、この苦しみから解放されることだ！どうかこの苦しみを…」{n}頭の後ろの肉の塊が震え、滑らかで太い触手が現れ、泣き叫ぶ彼女の顔を覆い、その中に引きずり込む。あなたは耳に圧力を感じる。檻の中から、絶望と恐怖で満たされているような、ほとんど聞き取れないような一定した音が聞こえてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体があなたの眼前で変化していく。腫瘍が潮が引くように引き、苦痛に歪んだ痩せた女性の顔が現れる。女性は息をのみ、動くようになった首を伸ばして叫んだ。{/n}「嘘つき！あなたは私を殺すと約束した！あなたは私を救うと約束した！あなたたちの誰もが、誰もが、希望を持てば苦しみは去ると言った！真実を受け入れよ、それこそが希望なのだと！私の唯一の希望は、この苦しみから解放されることだ！どうかこの苦しみを…」{n}頭の後ろの肉の塊が震え、滑らかで太い触手が現れ、泣き叫ぶ彼女の顔を覆い、その中に引きずり込む。あなたは耳に圧力を感じる。檻の中から、絶望と恐怖で満たされているような、ほとんど聞き取れないような一定した音が聞こえてくる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant verändert sich vor deinen Augen: Die Tumore ziehen sich zurück wie das Meer bei Ebbe und enthüllen ein ausgemergeltes weibliches Gesicht, das vor Schmerz verzerrt ist. Die Frau schnappt nach Luft, dehnt ihren jetzt beweglichen Hals und ruft:{/n} "LÜGNER! Ihr habt versprochen, mich zu töten! Ihr habt mir Erlösung versprochen! Ihr alle habt mir gesagt, ich solle Hoffnung haben, der Schmerz würde vergehen! Akzeptiert die Wahrheit, dann darin liegt Hoffnung! Meine einzige Hoffnung besteht darin, von diesem Schmerz befreit zu werden! Bitte sorgt dafür! SORGT DAF...!" {n}Ein Fleischklumpen hinter ihrem Kopf erzittert und setzt glitschige, dicke Tentakel frei, die ihr jammerndes Gesicht bedecken und in sich hineinziehen. Du spürst Druck auf den Ohren: Aus dem Käfig ertönt ein dauerhafter, kaum wahrnehmbarer Klang, der dich mit Verzweiflung und Schrecken erfüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

Die Frau schnappt nach Luft, dehnt ihren jetzt beweglichen Hals und ruft:{/n} "LÜGNER! Ihr habt versprochen, mich zu töten! Ihr habt mir Erlösung versprochen! Ihr alle habt mir gesagt, ich solle Hoffnung haben, der Schmerz würde vergehen! Akzeptiert die Wahrheit, dann darin liegt Hoffnung! Meine einzige Hoffnung besteht darin, von diesem Schmerz befreit zu werden! Bitte sorgt dafür! SORGT DAF...!" {n}Ein Fleischklumpen hinter ihrem Kopf erzittert und setzt glitschige, dicke Tentakel frei, die ihr jammerndes Gesicht bedecken und in sich hineinziehen. Du spürst Druck auf den Ohren: Aus dem Käfig ertönt ein dauerhafter, kaum wahrnehmbarer Klang, der dich mit Verzweiflung und Schrecken erfüllt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature change sous vos yeux : les tumeurs disparaissent comme une marée descendante pour révéler le visage d'une femme, émacié et déformé par une grimace de douleur. Elle prend une bouffée d'air, tend son cou redevenu mobile et s'exclame :{/n} « MENTEUR ! Vous aviez promis de me tuer ! Vous aviez promis de me libérer ! Vous tous, autant que vous êtes, m'avez dit que la douleur finirait par disparaître tant que je garderais l'espoir ! Que je devais accepter la vérité, car en elle réside l'espoir ! Mon seul espoir, c'est d'être délivrée de cette douleur ! Aidez-moi, je vous en prie ! METTEZ FIN À... » {n}Une excroissance derrière sa tête se met à frémir, puis il en jaillit des tentacules lisses et épais qui couvrent son visage hurlant et le font disparaître dans la masse de chair. Vous sentez la pression dans vos oreilles. De la cage provient un son régulier, presque imperceptible, qui vous emplit de désespoir et d'horreur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature change sous vos yeux : les tumeurs disparaissent comme une marée descendante pour révéler le visage d'une femme, émacié et déformé par une grimace de douleur. Elle prend une bouffée d'air, tend son cou redevenu mobile et s'exclame :{/n} « MENTEUR ! Vous aviez promis de me tuer ! Vous aviez promis de me libérer ! Vous tous, autant que vous êtes, m'avez dit que la douleur finirait par disparaître tant que je garderais l'espoir ! Que je devais accepter la vérité, car en elle réside l'espoir ! Mon seul espoir, c'est d'être délivrée de cette douleur ! Aidez-moi, je vous en prie ! METTEZ FIN À... » {n}Une excroissance derrière sa tête se met à frémir, puis il en jaillit des tentacules lisses et épais qui couvrent son visage hurlant et le font disparaître dans la masse de chair. Vous sentez la pression dans vos oreilles. De la cage provient un son régulier, presque imperceptible, qui vous emplit de désespoir et d'horreur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mutant, gözlerinin önünde şekil değiştiriyor. Vücudunu bezeyen tümörler, metcezir edasıyla çekilerek eziyet görmüş bir kadının nahif suratına yer açıyor. Kadın nefes almaya çalışıyor, artık oynatabildiği boynunu geriyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "YALANCILAR! Beni öldüreceğinize söz vermiştiniz! Beni kurtaracaktınız! Hepiniz bana umutlu olmamı, acının dineceğini söylediniz! Hakikat'e teslim olacakmışım, umut bu demekmiş! Benim tek umudum, bu eziyetten kurtulmak! Kurtarın, ne olur! KURTAR..." {n}Başının ardındaki bir et öbeği titreyerek içinde yumuşak, koca dokunaçlar çıkarıyor. Dokunaçlar, kadının feryat eden yüzünü kavrayıp kendine çekiyor. Kulaklarında bir basınç hissediyorsun: Kafesten; içini yeis ve dehşetle dolduran, daimî ve âdeta duyulamayan bir ses geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant changes before your eyes: the tumours recede like an ebbing tide, revealing an emaciated female face twisted in agony. The woman gasps for air, stretches her now mobile neck, and exclaims,{/n} "LIAR! You promised to kill me! You promised me deliverance! Every one of you, everyone told me to have hope and the pain would go! Accept the Truth, for that is hope! My only hope is to be freed from this pain! Please make it so! MAKE IT S—" {n}A lump of flesh behind her head shudders and sends out smooth, fat tentacles that cover her wailing face and drag it into itself. You feel the pressure in your ears: from the cage you hear a steady, almost imperceptible sound that fills you with despair and horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, gözlerinin önünde şekil değiştiriyor. Vücudunu bezeyen tümörler, metcezir edasıyla çekilerek eziyet görmüş bir kadının nahif suratına yer açıyor. Kadın nefes almaya çalışıyor, artık oynatabildiği boynunu geriyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} “YALANCILAR! Beni öldüreceğinize söz vermiştiniz! Beni kurtaracaktınız! Hepiniz bana umutlu olmamı, acının dineceğini söylediniz! Hakikat’e teslim olacakmışım, umut bu demekmiş! Benim tek umudum, bu eziyetten kurtulmak! Kurtarın, ne olur! KURTAR—” {n}Başının ardındaki bir et öbeği titreyerek yumuşak, koca dokunaçlar çıkarıyor içinden. Dokunaçlar, kadının feryat eden yüzünü kavrayıp kendine çekiyor. Kulaklarında bir basınç hissediyorsun: Kafesten; içini yeis ve dehşetle dolduran, daimî ve âdeta duyulamayan bir ses geliyor.{/n}
